testMatrix.description: Create Basic TimeEntry Model (Fields: startTime, endTime, accumulatedDuration)
Implement TaskTimer Start: Initialize timer and set internal state to RUNNING. Check StartTime is recorded.
Implement TaskTimer Pause: Calculate duration so far, set state to PAUSED. Clear current startTime.
Implement TaskTimer Resume: Set state back to RUNNING. Record new startTime. Preserve accumulated duration.
Implement TaskTimer Stop: Finalize total duration (accumulated + current session). Set state to STOPPED.
Implement JiraSyncService - formatWorklog: Convert duration (millis) to Jira format (e.g. "2h 30m").
Implement JiraSyncService - sync: Simulate API call. Verify it accepts correct payload (taskId, timeSpent, comment).
Integration: Verify Stop action triggers Sync Service and updates Status to RESOLVED.
